name: tm34
effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text.black_white: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.
